South Korean held in Russia for spying did humanitarian, mission work, says aid groupA South Korean missionary who has been arrested by Russia on spying charges was sent to do purely humanitarian and mission work and had no involvement in helping North Korean workers in the area to defect, the head of his Christian aid group said. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 03:12:25 GMT Y5DUT6SWWFLDZCJW7VOFKKL55U https://www.reuters.com/world/south-korean-held-Russia-spying-did- humanarian-mission-work-says-aid-group-2024-03-13/Jack Kim世界
China restaurant blast kills one, injures 22A suspected gas leak caused a blast at a restaurant in China's northern province of Hebei that ripped facades from buildings, damaged cars and scattered debris to kill one person and injure 22, state media and authorities said on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 02:42:34 GMT CSLH3BQMAVIVMGJSSN4KQRTVI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/explosion-hebei-china-restaurant-injures-several-people-state-media-reports-2024-03-13/Reuters世界中国
Stocks stride past US inflation to milestone highsAsian shares notched seven month highs on Wednesday, on the back of record peaks on Wall Street, as investors mostly shrugged off slightly hotter-than-expected U.S. inflation, betting it won't derail interest rate cuts expected by the middle of the year. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 02:16:26 GMT TGDW5DOZUVIFJHIKD5BZDYVHP4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-03-13/Tom Westbrook市场
Chinese EV giant BYD launches new version of e2 hatchback with lower starting priceChinese electric vehicle giant BYD on Wednesday launched a new version of e2 EV hatchback with a lower starting price than its predecessor. Sports and music lessons for China's kids in sharp decline as purse strings tightenLast August, Zhang Zhaolin pulled her 10-year-old son out of soccer classes that he loved after she was laid off from her job at a Chinese internet firm. Country Garden onshore bondholders have not received coupon payment, news site reportsCountry Garden's onshore bondholders said they have not received a coupon payment due on Tuesday, Chinese digital news outlet thepaper.cn reported.
